short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AdLighter lights up ads so you don't click them by accident.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*** Change Log for 1.04.007 ***
1. Removed ebay as it needs more work.
2. Fixed some CSS for Coupang

************************************************
I made this extension because I didn't want to click on Ads by mistake, but still want to see the information from advertisements.

As you can see from the screenshot, Adlighter will add red boxes and blue background on "sponsored" search results or Ads.

Website Supported:
- Amazon(US, UK, FR, ES, IT, DE, JP, IN)
- Reddit
- Google
- Pinterest
- Coupang

HOW-TO-USE :
1. Install the Chrome add-on
2. Use Amazon and Reddit as usual.
3. Notice the red and blue highlights.
